abstract: Atlanta judge dismisses charges against Madison Turner, who was ticketed for eating and driving.
lead_paragraph: A man who says he got a traffic ticket for eating a cheeseburger while driving in metro Atlanta will not be prosecuted after all.

headline.main: Georgia: Hold the Ticket With That Burger
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Hold the Ticket With That Burger

snippet: A man who says he got a traffic ticket for eating a cheeseburger while driving in metro Atlanta will not be prosecuted after all.
